text: We will hear arguments next in 76-635, United States Steel Corporation against Multistate Tax Commission.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the court.
Has it ever gotten out of a committee?
I do not believe it has ever gotten out of any committee nor been passed by either house.
But it has never been voted down?
It has never been voted down.
Has this court ever had occasion to address the question of whether an agreement from which a state could withdraw at any time was a compact within the meaning of the clause you are relying on?
No, I am not sure that this court has ever dealt with that question.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the court.
The Attorney General of Washington and the Attorney General’s opinion of Illinois.
Do you say the State Courts have followed that decision?
The state courts, Your Honors, have followed that decision and several of the decisions are put forth in our brief.
I think that consumes your additional time, Mr. Griswold.
We have limped along too long on Virginia against Tennessee.
